archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Determine Work Schedule
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process answers inquiries about available work capacity for a given time slot.

properties.value: This process is responsible for answering inquiries from other processes (like Customer-Ops), given a particular work task, about what timeframes the work can be performed in, considering dependencies between work tasks. This process does not look for a particular executor, but checks available work capacity in a particular time interval.
